content: There is a question "I like to have access too all the latest features" for which I assume s/too/to.

The options of "Approximately how many total developers does your company employ?" is inconsistent.
It's currently:

"Under 10", "11-49", "50-99", "100-500", "500-1,000", "1,000-10,000", and "Over 10,000"

I think it should be something like

"Under 10", "10-49", "50-99", "100-499", "500-999", "1,000-10,000", and "Over 10,000"

or

"Under 10", "10-50", "50-100", "100-500", "500-1,000", "1,000-10,000", and "Over 10,000"
